newsitem.title: USA: CUC International files for 11 mln shr offer.
newsitem.headline: CUC International files for 11 mln shr offer.

text.p: CUC International Inc said on Monday that it has filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for an 11 million common share secondary offering by certain stockholders.
Robert Davidson, Janice Davidson and certain charitable and family trusts established by them were offering the shares, the membership services company said.

CUC said that, adjusted for the company's three-for-two stock split, a total of 16.5 million shares would be offered. This did not include 2.48 million shares subject to the underwriters over-allotment option.
